error.daysRequiredForPeriod: At least one day must be selected for {period} period.

error.hourlyDurationRequired: Duration is required when Duration is enabled for Hourly period.
error.solarLocationRequired: Solar Event requires a location to be configured in editor settings.
error.solarOffsetRequired: Offset is required for Solar schedule type.
error.solarDurationRequired: Duration is required when Duration is enabled for Solar schedule type.
error.solarTimeDefinitionRequired: Start or end definition is required when Time is enabled for Solar schedule type.
error.solarTimeRequired: Time is required when Time is enabled for Solar schedule type.
error.cronValidRequired: A valid cron expression is required.
error.invalidScheduleType: Schedule Type must be either time, solar, or cron.
error.invalidTimespanForDailyWeekly: Invalid timespan for daily/weekly period. Only 'time' or false is allowed.
error.invalidTimespanForMonthly: Invalid timespan for monthly period. Only 'time' or false is allowed.
error.invalidTimespanForYearly: Invalid timespan for yearly period. Only 'time' or false is allowed.
error.invalidTimespanForMinutesHourly: Invalid timespan for minutes/hourly period. Only 'duration' or false is allowed.
error.invalidDayForYearly: Invalid day for yearly period; maximum day for {month} is {max}.
error.invalidPayloadTypeForNoTimespan: Invalid payload type for a schedule without a timespan.
error.invalidPayloadTypeForTimespan: Invalid payload type for a schedule with a timespan.
